mapper.sql: plog_.id AS plog_id, plog_.success AS plog_success, plog_.state AS plog_state, plog_.name AS plog_name, plog_.target_address AS plog_target_address, plog_.operator AS plog_operator, plog_.remark AS plog_remark, plog_.url AS plog_url, plog_.create_date AS plog_create_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pull_log ( success, state, `name`, target_address, operator, remark, url, create_date ) VALUES ( #{success}, #{state}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE pull_log
success = #{success}, state = #{state}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_address = #{targetAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
